channel.title: What number for player rights is donator?
channel.description:
i wanna make donator items, so only donators can have, but idk what the number code is..
Regular = 0
Moderator = 1
Admin = 2
Owner = 3
Donator = ?
please help?

item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:

:o can you set that up for me lol

I still have to make a donator class

item.title: What number for player rights is donator?
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“Bmaw, post:2, topic:281487”]You have to create your own class…

Btw Hidden Admin = 4[/quote]

i have my own class and sprite for donator. i also added this thing that you trade to players once they have donated to BECOME a donator and get the icon…but like i can’t spawn it for every1 once they donate, i want to be able to go into the characters folder and set it. but i have no idea what i set the number to be…

Read full topic
item.source: What number for player rights is donator?

item.title: What number for player rights is donator?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

It’s whatever you want it to be… Or, if you messed with your client to have a certain crown next to a certain playerRight, it’s still whatever you have it set as (the client tells 1 to be silver, 2 and 3 to be gold, and everything else to be nothing).

Read full topic
item.source: What number for player rights is donator?
